meanings.definition: To guide or lead someone out of a place.
meanings.sent1: I will outguide you to safety from the forest.
meanings.sent2: She outguides tourists through the maze of streets in the city.
meanings.sent3: The friendly dog outguided the lost child back to their family.
meanings.sent4: His experience as a scout helped him outguide his friends in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The bright flashlight outguided us through the dark tunnel.

meanings.definition: A guide or map used to navigate outside or away from a location.
meanings.sent1: The outguide provided detailed directions for the hiking trail.
meanings.sent2: She always carries an outguide when exploring new places.
meanings.sent3: The outguide was so old, it led us in circles around the park.
meanings.sent4: The outguide acted as a compass in the vast desert of information.
meanings.sent5: The outguide's colorful illustrations made the journey exciting.
